participant_1.background:
I love pineapples because they are sweet and refreshing.
I try to decorate our home in a way that makes it feel more like a place where we can both relax and feel at home.
i am a democrat.
i m a vegan.
I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger.

participant_2.background:
I need a home that is close to a music venue and has a large backyard for my boys to play in.
I have a tattoo on my back that they don't know about.
I cook cheap but delicious food that my friends love and use my apple devices to keep my life organized.
i like to cook breakfast on sundays.
i enjoy john gresham movies , but not his books.

content.text: Hello there!  How are you this fine morning?
Hi there!  I am doing well thanks for asking!  How about yourself?
Doing great!  I am just relaxing and getting ready for the day.
Nice!  What are you up to today?
Not much really, just going to clean the house and do some errands.  How about you?
I have a lot going on today.  I have to take my boys to the park, then I have to go grocery shopping, and then I have to make dinner.  But I am excited because I am going to a concert tonight!
Oh that sounds like a busy day!  But the concert sounds fun!  Who are you going to see?
I am going to see John Grisham!  I love his books and I have heard that his concerts are great.
Oh that sounds awesome!  I have never heard of a John Grisham concert before.
They are not very common, but they are really fun!  He reads from his books and tells stories about how they came to be.
That sounds really interesting!  I am going to have to check that out sometime.
You should!  I think you would really enjoy it.
Thanks for the recommendation!  I appreciate it!
No problem!  Have a great day!
